title: 'Boys and Girl - MNF Win Reaction; Black Cats; Cowboys Second Half Storylines with Clarence Hill Jr.
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - MNF Win Reaction; Black Cats; Cowboys Second Half Storylines with Clarence Hill Jr.
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby welcome Clarence Hill Jr. from the Fort Worth Star-Telegram to break down some of the second half storylines in Cowboys Nation. They’ll also look back at Dallas’ big win on Monday Night Football over the Giants and the black cat. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys' community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
